column4: Is it possible to write to a protected folder without giving it read/write access?
who is writing to the folder?
a normal user (me) i just dont want to 777 it out
could i make folders inside that one and write to those?
you could change the owner of the file to you or alternativly the group to users and then only add write access to that
ok and thats the only way?
depends on your use case, what is the folder?
its just a watch folder for rtorrent
so you want rtorrent and yourself to be able to write to it?
rtorrent can just fine, but i cant :(
is rtorrent running as root or some custom user?
yea you should be able to change the group to 'users' and set g+rw to be able to access it
